title: generate-multiple-choice-questions-from-pdf
description: Test the API endpoint for generating multiple choice questions from PDF using AI. Verify that the questions are correctly generated based on the PDF content and returned in the expected format.

title: generate-educational-flashcards-from-pdf
description: Test the API endpoint for generating educational flashcards from PDF using AI. Ensure flashcards are created with correct front and back content derived from the PDF.

title: populate-educational-materials-from-pdf
description: Test the API endpoint that extracts and structures educational content from PDF files. Verify that the materials are correctly parsed and stored in the system.

title: stripe-checkout-session-creation
description: Test the API endpoint for creating a Stripe checkout session. Validate that the session is created successfully with correct subscription plan details and user information.

title: verify-stripe-payment-status
description: Test the API endpoint for verifying Stripe payment status. Confirm that payment verification returns accurate status and triggers confirmation emails upon successful payment.

title: parse-pdf-content-for-extraction
description: Test the API endpoint responsible for parsing PDF files to extract content. Ensure the parsing is accurate and the extracted data matches the PDF content.

title: user-dashboard-simulated-exams-view
description: Test the dashboard API or component that displays simulated exams and user progress. Verify that simulated exams are shown correctly with scores and feedback.

title: admin-questions-management
description: Test the administrative API or interface for managing questions. Verify CRUD operations on questions and ensure data integrity.

title: admin-flashcards-management
description: Test the administrative API or interface for managing flashcards. Validate creation, update, deletion, and listing of flashcards.

title: admin-audit-logs-access-and-filtering
description: Test the administrative API or interface for accessing and filtering audit logs. Ensure logs are correctly recorded and can be filtered by date, user, and action.
